cells.data:
# export LOCAL_PATH=`pwd`
# mkdir -p $LOCAL_PATH/instance/config/openshift/scripts
# Get the script
# Resulted in error "lookup index.docker.io on 192.168.65.9:53: cannot unmarshal DNS message" https://github.com/docker/for-mac/issues/1103 w/ docker v 1.12.6
# docker run -ti -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v ${LOCAL_PATH}:/data eclipse/che init
# cd ${LOCAL_PATH}/instance/config/openshift/scripts

# takes a while :|
git clone https://github.com/eclipse/che
export LOCAL_PATH=`pwd`
cd che/deploy/openshift/
CHE_DEDICATED_KEYCLOAK=true
export CHE_MULTIUSER=true
export WAIT_FOR_CHE=true

# MPB 16 GByte
minishift start --cpus 7 --memory=8192 --ocp-tag v3.7.14 --skip-registration
./deploy_che.sh

# From the minishift addons README
# As per https://github.com/eclipse/che-docs/pull/351/files/e07e695131f6fa2c36b147ca980dbe4d101d916c this should all included in deploy_che.sh
# STACKS_SCRIPT_URL=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eclipse/che/master/dockerfiles/instance/config/openshift/scripts
# curl -fsSL ${STACKS_SCRIPT_URL} -o ./stacks-che.sh
# TODO Check project name
# oc project mini-che && bash ./stacks-che.sh
